description: A calendar component for date selection

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The current selected date in YYYY-MM-DD format

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: The minimum date that can be selected in YYYY-MM-DD format

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: The maximum date that can be selected in YYYY-MM-DD format

attributes.name: format
attributes.description: Date format to use

attributes.name: locale
attributes.description: Locale for date formatting

attributes.name: today
attributes.description: Automatically sets today as the active date

attributes.name: jumpable
attributes.description: Allows user to select a month and type a year to jump to a specific date

attributes.name: starts-with
attributes.description: Sets the starting day of the week: 0 (Sunday) or 1 (Monday)

attributes.name: disabled-dates
attributes.description: A comma-separated list of dates to disable in YYYY-MM-DD format

attributes.name: marked-dates
attributes.description: A comma-separated list of dates to add an indicator in YYYY-MM-DD format

attributes.name: view-date
attributes.description: Sets the initial view date of the calendar in YYYY-MM-DD format

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Sets the name of the hidden input field for form submission

attributes.name: cls-custom
attributes.description: Allows adding custom CSS classes to the calendar

attributes.name: i18n
attributes.description: Enables internationalization with custom weekday and month names

attributes.name: force-prevent-rerender
attributes.description: Forcefully prevents component rerendering

description: A chart component that wraps ApexCharts for easy integration

attributes.name: cls-custom
attributes.description: Allows adding custom CSS classes to the chart container div

attributes.name: reactive
attributes.description: Enables reactivity by monitoring the referenced script element for changes

attributes.name: force-prevent-rerender
attributes.description: Forcefully prevents component rerendering

description: A command palette component that can be bound to keyboard shortcuts and toggled as a modal

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: Assigns a keyboard shortcut to open the command palette

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: The placeholder text for the search input

attributes.name: toggle
attributes.description: Used as the ID of the modal for manually toggling the component

attributes.name: force-prevent-rerender
attributes.description: Forcefully prevents component rerendering

description: An icon component using Lucide icons with customizable attributes

attributes.name: cls-custom
attributes.description: Allows adding custom CSS classes to the SVG tag

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Specifies the icon to display from the Lucide icon set

attributes.name: stroke-width
attributes.description: Customizes the stroke width of the icon

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Customizes the height of the icon

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Customizes the width of the icon

description: A customizable date and time picker component with various display options

attributes.name: today
attributes.description: Automatically sets today as the active date

attributes.name: jumpable
attributes.description: Allows user to select a month and type a year to jump to a specific date

attributes.name: starts-with
attributes.description: Sets the starting day of the week: 0 (Sunday) or 1 (Monday)

attributes.name: disabled-dates
attributes.description: A comma-separated list of dates to disable in YYYY-MM-DD format

attributes.name: marked-dates
attributes.description: A comma-separated list of dates to add an indicator in YYYY-MM-DD format

attributes.name: view-date
attributes.description: Sets the initial view date of the calendar in YYYY-MM-DD format

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: Sets the minimum date that can be selected in YYYY-MM-DD format

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Sets the maximum date that can be selected in YYYY-MM-DD format

attributes.name: cls-custom
attributes.description: Allows adding custom CSS classes to different parts of the component

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables all input fields, making the entire component read-only

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Defines the name of the input for form submission

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: A valid date time in YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM format to prepopulate

attributes.name: i18n
attributes.description: Enables internationalization with custom labels and text

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Sets a customized icon (defaults to calendar if not specified)

attributes.name: drop
attributes.description: Customizes the dropping options for the dropdown calendar

attributes.name: with-time
attributes.description: Allows inputting of time along with the date

attributes.name: require-time
attributes.description: Requires time input (prepopulates current time if left blank)

attributes.name: display-format
attributes.description: Customizes the display format of the date using format tokens

attributes.description: Forcefully prevents component rerendering

description: A component for entering PIN codes or verification sequences

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.description: Automatically focuses on the first input field when the component is rendered

attributes.name: cls-custom
attributes.description: Allows adding custom CSS classes to the component

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables all input fields, making the entire component read-only

attributes.name: length
attributes.description: Specifies the number of input fields for the PIN sequence

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Defines the name of the PIN input for form submission

attributes.name: force-prevent-rerender
attributes.description: Forcefully prevents component rerendering

description: A customizable range slider component with single or dual knobs

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Specifies the name of the hidden input field for form submissions

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the slider, preventing user interaction

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: Enables dual-knob mode for selecting a range of values

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: Defines the minimum selectable value

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Defines the maximum selectable value

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: Specifies the interval between selectable values

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Displays a value label above the knob (true for numbers, string for custom labels)

attributes.name: label-position
attributes.description: Sets the position of the label relative to the knob (top or bottom)

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Defines the initial value (single number or comma-separated range)

attributes.name: force-prevent-rerender
attributes.description: Forcefully prevents component rerendering

description: A component for creating and managing lists of tags or keywords

attributes.name: cls-custom
attributes.description: Allows adding custom CSS classes to the component

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables input field, making the entire component read-only

attributes.name: maxlength
attributes.description: The maximum length of each tag before it can be added

attributes.name: minlength
attributes.description: The minimum length of each tag before it can be added

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the input field for form submission ([] will be appended)

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: The placeholder text displayed in the input field

attributes.name: slugify
attributes.description: Whether to slugify the input string before adding it as a tag

attributes.name: slugify-options
attributes.description: Customization options for the slugify behavior

attributes.name: state
attributes.description: The visual state of the tags (primary, secondary, or destructive)

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: A comma-separated list of tags to prepopulate in the component

attributes.name: force-prevent-rerender
attributes.description: Forcefully prevents component rerendering

description: A custom select dropdown component that enhances the native select tag

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Specifies the name of the input field for form submission

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: Allows selecting multiple options from the dropdown

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the select component, preventing user interaction

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Sets the placeholder text when no option is selected

attributes.name: searchable
attributes.description: Adds a search input field to filter options in the dropdown

attributes.name: insertable
attributes.description: Allows users to add new options that aren't in the original list

attributes.name: cls-custom
attributes.description: Allows adding custom CSS classes to different parts of the component

attributes.name: i18n
attributes.description: Enables internationalization with custom labels and text

attributes.name: reactive
attributes.description: Enables monitoring the hidden select element for changes

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: A comma-separated list of values to prepopulate in the select

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Sets a customized icon for the select dropdown

attributes.name: drop
attributes.description: Customizes the dropdown behavior and positioning

attributes.name: send-url
attributes.description: The endpoint URL for AJAX requests when using insertable options

attributes.name: send-headers
attributes.description: JSON-stringified HTTP headers for AJAX requests

attributes.name: send-method
attributes.description: The HTTP method for AJAX requests (defaults to POST)

attributes.name: force-prevent-rerender
attributes.description: Forcefully prevents component rerendering
